1: תְּפִלָּ֖ה <sup>8605 </sup> <n>A prayer</n> לַחֲבַקּ֣וּק <sup>2265 </sup> <n>of Habakkuk</n> הַנָּבִ֑יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>the prophet</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>according</n> שִׁגְיֹנֽוֹת׃ <sup>7692 </sup> <n>upon Shigionoth</n>
2: יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <sup>8085 </sup> <n>I have heard</n> שִׁמְעֲךָ֮ <sup>8088 </sup> <n>thy speech</n> יָרֵאתִי֒ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>[and] was afraid</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> פָּֽעָלְךָ֙ <sup>6467 </sup> <n>thy work</n> בְּקֶ֤רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> שָׁנִים֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>of the years</n> חַיֵּ֔יהוּ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>revive</n> בְּקֶ֥רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> שָׁנִ֖ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>of the years</n> תּוֹדִ֑יעַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>make known</n> בְּרֹ֖גֶז <sup>7267 </sup> <n>in wrath</n> רַחֵ֥ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>mercy</n> תִּזְכּֽוֹר׃ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>remember</n>
3: אֱל֙וֹהַ֙ <sup>433 </sup> <n>God</n> מִתֵּימָ֣ן <sup>8487 </sup> <n>from Teman</n> יָב֔וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> וְקָד֥וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>and the Holy One</n> מֵֽהַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>from mount</n> פָּארָ֖ן <sup>6290 </sup> <n>Paran</n> סֶ֑לָה <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n> כִּסָּ֤ה <sup>3680 </sup> <n>covered</n> שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> הוֹד֔וֹ <sup>1935 </sup> <n>His glory</n> וּתְהִלָּת֖וֹ <sup>8416 </sup> <n>of his praise</n> מָלְאָ֥ה <sup>4390 </sup> <n>was full</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the earth</n>
4: וְנֹ֙גַהּ֙ <sup>5051 </sup> <n>And [his] brightness</n> כָּא֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>was as the light</n> תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> קַרְנַ֥יִם <sup>7161 </sup> <n>he had horns</n> מִיָּד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[coming] out of his hand</n> ל֑וֹ וְשָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> חֶבְי֥וֹן <sup>2253 </sup> <n>and there [was] the hiding</n> עֻזֹּֽה׃ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>of his power</n>
5: לְפָנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>Before</n> יֵ֣לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>goes</n> דָּ֑בֶר <sup>1698 </sup> <n>the pestilence</n> וְיֵצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went forth</n> רֶ֖שֶׁף <sup>7565 </sup> <n>and burning coals</n> לְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>at his feet</n>
6: עָמַ֣ד ׀ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>He stood</n> וַיְמֹ֣דֶד <sup>4058 </sup> <n>and surveyed</n> אֶ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> רָאָה֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>he beheld</n> וַיַּתֵּ֣ר <sup>5425 </sup> <n>and drove asunder</n> גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the nations</n> וַיִּתְפֹּֽצְצוּ֙ <sup>6327 </sup> <n>were scattered</n> הַרְרֵי־ <sup>2042 </sup> <n>mountains</n> עַ֔ד <sup>5703 </sup> <n>and the everlasting</n> שַׁח֖וּ <sup>7817 </sup> <n>did bow</n> גִּבְע֣וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>hills</n> עוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>the perpetual</n> הֲלִיכ֥וֹת <sup>1979 </sup> <n>his ways</n> עוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[are] everlasting</n> לֽוֹ׃
7: תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> אָ֔וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>in affliction</n> רָאִ֖יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I saw</n> אָהֳלֵ֣י <sup>168 </sup> <n>the tents</n> כוּשָׁ֑ן <sup>3572 </sup> <n>of Cushan</n> יִרְגְּז֕וּן <sup>7264 </sup> <n>did tremble</n> יְרִיע֖וֹת <sup>3407 </sup> <n>[and] the curtains</n> אֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> מִדְיָֽן׃ <sup>4080 </sup> <n>of Midian</n> ס
8: הֲבִנְהָרִים֙ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>the rivers</n> חָרָ֣ה <sup>2734 </sup> <n>displeased</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Was the LORD</n> אִ֤ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>Or</n> בַּנְּהָרִים֙ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>the rivers</n> אַפֶּ֔ךָ <sup>639 </sup> <n>your anger</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Or</n> בַּיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>against the sea</n> עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <sup>5678 </sup> <n>your wrath</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> תִרְכַּב֙ <sup>7392 </sup> <n>that thou didst ride</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> סוּסֶ֔יךָ <sup>5483 </sup> <n>upon thine horses</n> מַרְכְּבֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>4818 </sup> <n>[and] thy chariots</n> יְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>deliverance</n>
9: עֶרְיָ֤ה <sup>6181 </sup> <n>was made quite</n> תֵעוֹר֙ <sup>5783 </sup> <n>naked</n> קַשְׁתֶּ֔ךָ <sup>7198 </sup> <n>Thy bow</n> שְׁבֻע֥וֹת <sup>7621 </sup> <n>[according] to the oaths</n> מַטּ֖וֹת <sup>4294 </sup> <n>of the tribes</n> אֹ֣מֶר <sup>562 </sup> <n>[even thy] word</n> סֶ֑לָה <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n> נְהָר֖וֹת <sup>5104 </sup> <n>with rivers</n> תְּבַקַּע־ <sup>1234 </sup> <n>Thou didst cleave</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n>
10: רָא֤וּךָ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> יָחִ֙ילוּ֙ <sup>2342 </sup> <n>thee [and] they trembled</n> הָרִ֔ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>The mountains</n> זֶ֥רֶם <sup>2230 </sup> <n>the overflowing</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of the water</n> עָבָ֑ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>passed by</n> נָתַ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>uttered</n> תְּהוֹם֙ <sup>8415 </sup> <n>the deep</n> קוֹל֔וֹ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>his voice</n> ר֖וֹם <sup>7315 </sup> <n>on high</n> יָדֵ֥יהוּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hands</n> נָשָֽׂא׃ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>[and] lifted up</n>
11: שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>The sun</n> יָרֵ֖חַ <sup>3394 </sup> <n>[and] moon</n> עָ֣מַד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stood still</n> זְבֻ֑לָה <sup>2073 </sup> <n>in their habitation</n> לְא֤וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>at the light</n> חִצֶּ֙יךָ֙ <sup>2671 </sup> <n>of thine arrows</n> יְהַלֵּ֔כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>they went</n> לְנֹ֖גַהּ <sup>5051 </sup> <n>[and] at the shining</n> בְּרַ֥ק <sup>1300 </sup> <n>of thy glittering</n> חֲנִיתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>2595 </sup> <n>spear</n>
12: בְּזַ֖עַם <sup>2195 </sup> <n>in indignation</n> תִּצְעַד־ <sup>6805 </sup> <n>Thou didst march through</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> בְּאַ֖ף <sup>639 </sup> <n>in anger</n> תָּד֥וּשׁ <sup>1758 </sup> <n>thou didst thresh</n> גּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the heathen</n>
13: יָצָ֙אתָ֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Thou wentest forth</n> לְיֵ֣שַׁע <sup>3468 </sup> <n>for the salvation</n> עַמֶּ֔ךָ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of thy people</n> לְיֵ֖שַׁע <sup>3468 </sup> <n>[even] for salvation</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מְשִׁיחֶ֑ךָ <sup>4899 </sup> <n>with thine anointed</n> מָחַ֤צְתָּ <sup>4272 </sup> <n>thou woundedst</n> רֹּאשׁ֙ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>the head</n> מִבֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>out of the house</n> רָשָׁ֔ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> עָר֛וֹת <sup>6168 </sup> <n>by discovering</n> יְס֥וֹד <sup>3247 </sup> <n>the foundation</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> צַוָּ֖אר <sup>6677 </sup> <n>unto the neck</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n> פ
14: נָקַ֤בְתָּ <sup>5344 </sup> <n>Thou didst strike through</n> בְמַטָּיו֙ <sup>4294 </sup> <n>with his staves</n> רֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>the head</n> [פְּרָזֹו כ] (פְּרָזָ֔יו <sup>6518 </sup> <n>village</n> ק) יִסְעֲר֖וּ <sup>5590 </sup> <n>they came out as a whirlwind</n> לַהֲפִיצֵ֑נִי <sup>6327 </sup> <n>to scatter</n> עֲלִ֣יצֻתָ֔ם <sup>5951 </sup> <n>me their rejoicing</n> כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>[was] as to devour</n> עָנִ֖י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>the poor</n> בַּמִּסְתָּֽר׃ <sup>4565 </sup> <n>secretly</n>
15: דָּרַ֥כְתָּ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>Thou didst walk</n> בַיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>through the sea</n> סוּסֶ֑יךָ <sup>5483 </sup> <n>with thine horses</n> חֹ֖מֶר <sup>2563 </sup> <n>[through] the heap</n> מַ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> רַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>of great</n>
16: שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי ׀ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>When I heard</n> וַתִּרְגַּ֣ז <sup>7264 </sup> <n>trembled</n> בִּטְנִ֗י <sup>990 </sup> <n>my belly</n> לְקוֹל֙ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>at the voice</n> צָלֲל֣וּ <sup>6750 </sup> <n>quivered</n> שְׂפָתַ֔י <sup>8193 </sup> <n>my lips</n> יָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>entered</n> רָקָ֛ב <sup>7538 </sup> <n>rottenness</n> בַּעֲצָמַ֖י <sup>6106 </sup> <n>into my bones</n> וְתַחְתַּ֣י <sup>8478 </sup> <n>my place</n> אֶרְגָּ֑ז <sup>7264 </sup> <n>and I trembled</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Because</n> אָנ֙וּחַ֙ <sup>5117 </sup> <n>in myself that I might rest</n> לְי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> צָרָ֔ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of trouble</n> לַעֲל֖וֹת <sup>5927 </sup> <n>when he cometh up</n> לְעַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto the people</n> יְגוּדֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>1464 </sup> <n>he will invade them with his troops</n>
17: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Though</n> תְאֵנָ֣ה <sup>8384 </sup> <n>Although the fig tree</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תִפְרָ֗ח <sup>6524 </sup> <n>shall not blossom</n> וְאֵ֤ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> יְבוּל֙ <sup>2981 </sup> <n>neither [shall] fruit</n> בַּגְּפָנִ֔ים <sup>1612 </sup> <n>[be] in the vines</n> כִּחֵשׁ֙ <sup>3584 </sup> <n>shall fail</n> מַעֲשֵׂה־ <sup>4639 </sup> <n>the labour</n> זַ֔יִת <sup>2132 </sup> <n>of the olive</n> וּשְׁדֵמ֖וֹת <sup>7709 </sup> <n>and the fields</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> עָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shall yield</n> אֹ֑כֶל <sup>400 </sup> <n>no meat</n> גָּזַ֤ר <sup>1504 </sup> <n>shall be cut off</n> מִמִּכְלָה֙ <sup>4356 </sup> <n>from the fold</n> צֹ֔אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>the flock</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>be no</n> בָּקָ֖ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>and [there shall be] no herd</n> בָּרְפָתִֽים׃ <sup>7517 </sup> <n>in the stalls</n>
18: וַאֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>in</n> בַּיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> אֶעְל֑וֹזָה <sup>5937 </sup> <n>Yet I will rejoice</n> אָגִ֖ילָה <sup>1523 </sup> <n>I will joy</n> בֵּאלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>in the God</n> יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of my salvation</n>
19: יְהוִ֤ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> אֲדֹנָי֙ <sup>136 </sup> <n>God</n> חֵילִ֔י <sup>2428 </sup> <n>[is] my strength</n> וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and he will make</n> רַגְלַי֙ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>my feet</n> כָּֽאַיָּל֔וֹת <sup>355 </sup> <n>like hinds'</n> וְעַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> בָּמוֹתַ֖י <sup>1116 </sup> <n>upon mine high places</n> יַדְרִכֵ֑נִי <sup>1869 </sup> <n>[feet] and he will make me to walk</n> לַמְנַצֵּ֖חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief singer</n> בִּנְגִינוֹתָֽי׃ <sup>5058 </sup> <n>on my stringed instruments</n>
